title: Lighthouse Protocol SOP
description: Structured Issue-Driven Development Process for systematic feature development
purpose: Provide a lighthouse protocol that guides feature decisions through systematic analysis to prevent scope creep and ensure user value delivery
scope: All new feature requests, enhancements, and significant development initiatives

roles.product_owner: Person applying product owner mindset to analyze requests
roles.development_team: Team members implementing features using the protocol
roles.stakeholders: Users and team members providing input and feedback

trigger_conditions: Significant scope addition to existing work

steps.description: Analyze the request through product owner lens
Evaluate options and choose the best path
criteria: Pros and cons for each pathway

steps.description: Generate memorable, meaningful names for the feature
Create clear user story as first element
steps.format: As a [user type], I want [goal] so that [benefit]

steps.description: Document the complete analysis in GitHub issue

success_criteria: All stakeholders understand scope and rationale
Complete documentation available for future reference
elons_5_rules_integration: Make requirements less dumb - Question every requirement in Product Owner Analysis
Delete the part or process - Eliminate unnecessary complexity in pathway evaluation
Simplify and optimize - Choose simplest viable approach in Decision Rationale
Accelerate cycle time - Systematic process reduces decision time
Automate - Template and process automation through GitHub integration

examples.user_story: As a product owner navigating rapid development cycles, I want a lighthouse protocol that guides feature decisions through systematic analysis so that every feature safely reaches its intended user value destination without shipwrecking on scope creep
